name: Agata's Quest
description:
Agata's Quest is my AGP (Advanced Game Project) for my final year at Game design and development course at LSBU.

It's a point and click adventure game inspired by The Longest Journey and several indie games like Lieve Oma. The goal of the game is to save your ill dog by helping out forest animals.

It's a tribute to my childhood dog who I loved dearly.
